title: 06/18/21 DPS Hour 3 David Thorpe
itunes:title: 06/18/21 DPS Hour 3 David Thorpe
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre, in for Dan Patrick, discuss the drama developing with the Dallas Mavericks. The guys debate the merits of Ty Lue's coaching career. David Thorpe of TrueHoop.com joins the guys to talk the latest in the NBA Playoffs and discuss the possibility of the first female head coach in the NBA. Plus, the guys preview Friday night's pair of Game 6s!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
